data.eml:eml: A new species of Linopherus (Annelida, Amphinomidae) from Beibu Gulf, South China Sea

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sun, Yue, Li, Xinzheng (2016): A new species of Linopherus (Annelida, Amphinomidae) from Beibu Gulf, South China Sea. ZooKeys 640: 37-43, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.640.9619, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.640.9619
